summary: Branding updates are evident in Header/Footer (logo path and English “Exam Xpresss” text), but there is no evidence that the required generated image assets were added under frontend/public/assets/generated. There is also insufficient evidence that favicon/app icons were generated and wired up, and that the build/deployment failure was fully resolved. Several unrelated/extra changes appear to have been introduced (e.g., sitemap, Google verification, significant auth/session and UX changes).

missing_requirements.requirement: Create clean, watermark-free Exam Xpresss logo assets from the user-uploaded logo image(s) and add them as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references /assets/generated/exam-xpresss-logo-clean.dim_512x512.png, but the diff summary shows no added static asset files and provides no evidence that the required PNG actually exists under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: File diff summary: "Added: 0" (no new files shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate favicon/app icon PNGs from the clean logo and ensure the app uses them in the HTML document head.
missing_requirements.reason: There is no evidence in the diff summary that the required favicon/app icon PNG files were created under frontend/public/assets/generated, and frontend/index.html changes are only described in a secondary summary without showing the actual <link rel="icon"> / apple-touch-icon entries.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions "frontend/index.html" corrected favicon paths, but no icon files shown)
File diff summary: "Added: 0" (no new generated PNGs shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Update/verify UI branding to use the Exam Xpresss logo as the primary brand mark in the header and remove any visible 'Caffeine AI' / 'caffeine.ai' branding across the UI (including footer attribution).
missing_requirements.reason: Header/Footer updates to use the Exam Xpresss logo are evidenced, but the diff summary does not provide enough coverage of all UI text/components to verify that no 'Caffeine AI'/'caffeine.ai' attribution remains anywhere in the UI.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (claims Caffeine AI attribution removed, but does not show all UI files)

missing_requirements.requirement: Resolve the build/deployment failure so the project successfully builds and deploys to the Internet Computer without errors.
missing_requirements.reason: While multiple changes suggest attempts to improve build/deployment compatibility (e.g., App routing/auth handling, Tailwind safelist), the diff summary does not include evidence of the specific deployment error being addressed, nor any confirmation that install/build/deploy now succeeds.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (describes deployment compatibility changes but no demonstrated successful deploy)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated sitemap and Google Search Console verification in the HTML.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (branding assets + favicon wiring + removing Caffeine AI branding + fix deployment). Sitemap/GSC are extra SEO/marketing additions.

hallucinated_features.description: Substantial UI/UX and behavior changes beyond branding (e.g., new error boundary screen, altered authentication/session handling, retry policies).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on branding assets and fixing deployment; broad auth/session and app behavior changes appear to exceed the stated scope and non-goals.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (ErrorBoundary, extensive react-query retry logic, session-state auth comment)

hallucinated_features.description: Admin panel/editor usability changes (e.g., enlarged syllabus editor sizing).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; could be considered a product/feature tweak unrelated to branding assets or deployment fix.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx": enlarged syllabus editor 500px min-height, larger font, padding)

hallucinated_features.description: Mobile login modal enhancements including OTP copy-to-clipboard UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by branding/deployment-focused BuildRequest; appears to be a new UX feature.
